    • Constructor Detail

      • Wheel

        public Wheel(java.util.Random rng)

    • Method Detail

      • getBin

        public Bin getBin(int index)
        Returns the Bin at the index specified. The bin indexes correspond to the roulette bins of 0-36. Index 37 corresponds to the "00" bin.
        Parameters:
        index - Index of the desired bin. Should lie within 0 and 37 (boundaries included).
        Returns:
        Bin corresponding to the index

      • setRandom

        public void setRandom(java.util.Random rng)

      • addBin

        public void addBin(Bin bin)

      • addOutcomeToBin

        public void addOutcomeToBin(int binIndex,
                   Outcome outcome)
        Associates the bin at index binIndex with the given Outcome. If the index is valid (i.e. this.getBin != null), the Outcome is registered with the wheel and bin and may be retrieved by this.getOutcome.
        Parameters:
        binIndex - Index of the bin the outcome should be registered to
        outcome - Outcome that should be registered with the bin corresponding to the given index

      • getOutcome

        public Outcome getOutcome(java.lang.String name)
        Returns the outcome corresponding to a certain outcome name. Returns null f no corresponding outcome is registered to the wheel.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the requested outcome. For formatting please see the BinBuilder class.
        Returns:
        Outcome object if it is registered to the wheel, or null if no Outcome is registered.

      • next

        public Bin next()
        Returns:
        a random Bin in Wheel.bins
